    • Method Detail

      • read

        public void read(BitInput input)
          throws IOException
        Reads accessibles from given input. First, a 31-bit unsigned integer is read for accessible count. And reads all accessibles.
        Specified by:
        read in interface BitAccessible
        Parameters:
        input - input
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • write

        public void write(BitOutput output)
           throws IOException
        Writes accessibles to given output. First, a 31-bit unsigned integer is written for accessible count. And writes all accessibles.
        Specified by:
        write in interface BitAccessible
        Parameters:
        output - output
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
